38 
39 // Uncomment the following if the video streaming must be suspended while
40 // the audio streaming is being started, and also to make sure that audio
41 // nodes are always started first when calling Context::startNodes() or
42 // when resuming from suspend.
43 // This is typically the case on Linux with the DS325 because of an OV570 FW
44 // bug which randomly crashes the USB controller when, on startup, the usb-audio
45 // kernel driver issues a GET_CUR on the audio sampling frequency (which also
46 // results in freezing the video streaming).
47 #ifdef UNIX
48 # define OV570_AUDIO_STARTUP_BUG
49 #endif // UNIX
50

314  bool operator () (NodeServer* node) const
